title: Rock Fruit Tier List
description: Explore the Rock Fruit tier list, compiled from community votes, ranking fruits based on their performance in PvE, PvP, and farming scenarios.
heading: Rock Fruit Tier List
introText: Explore the Rock Fruit tier list, compiled from community votes, ranking fruits based on their performance in PvE, PvP, and farming scenarios.

data.itemDescription: Exceptional DPS, extensive range, and area-of-effect (AoE) capabilities. Offers significant crowd control, making it versatile across various game modes
High damage output with impressive range. However, its narrow AoE abilities can limit effectiveness in certain situations
Known for its powerful stuns and interrupts, combined with solid range and AoE
Offers excellent range and damage, making it a strong choice for mid-game progression
Provides substantial freeze-based crowd control and short cooldowns, though it has lower DPS compared to others in this tier
A reliable mid-game fruit with decent damage and AoE, but it has relatively limited range
Allows for flight and delivers moderate damage and AoE. However, it doesn't stand out compared to other legendary fruits

Features good AoE and damage but lacks range and crowd control abilities.
Destructoid
Offers good range and AoE, along with a teleportation move. However, its low DPS diminishes its overall effectiveness
Provides health regeneration upon hitting enemies and has decent AoE and range, but suffers from low DPS
Suitable primarily for early-game use due to its limited damage and utility
